title: Trump officials reportedly ask Congress for $58m in security after Kirk shooting
summary: Funding is being allocated to enhance security for members of the executive and judicial branches, with the possibility of extending protection to members of Congress as well. This initiative aims to bolster safety measures amidst growing concerns for their well-being. The proposed financial support reflects increasing attention to the threats facing government officials.

title: Australia news live: ANZ bank fined $240m for ‘widespread misconduct’ in regulator Asic’s biggest ever penalty
summary: Please provide the news content you would like summarized, and I'll be happy to help!

title: Man arrested over ‘racially motivated’ rape of woman in West Midlands
summary: A British-born Sikh woman in her 20s reported to police that she was subjected to a racist remark during an assault in Oldbury. The incident has raised concerns about racial violence in the area. Authorities are investigating the reported hate crime.

title: Peter Mandelson seen as ‘worth the risk’ as US ambassador, minister says
summary: Peter Kyle defends the appointment of a new official, stating that "singular talents" were weighed against existing warnings. This comes as the family of an Epstein accuser expresses criticism regarding the decision. The controversy highlights concerns over past associations and their implications for the role.

title: Coldwater review – Andrew Lincoln’s wild Scottish thriller is top quality nonsense
summary: A star from The Walking Dead portrays a clueless character who inadvertently gets involved in a frightening encounter in the woods. The narrative draws a parallel to the intense atmosphere of the film Deliverance. The setting is described as taking place in the scenic but ominous Scottish Highlands.
